text: @johnrobertsFox @CDCgov @realDonaldTrump Took him long enough. Church is more essential than a damn liquor store. John I wish you would be that one to open the ppl's eyes. Yes this virus killed and like Prez said just 1 is 1 too many but we can't stop living. We don't with the flu so we shouldn't with the coronavirus.
